verses.verse: You shall make <S%H6213><s%> you no idols <S%H457><s%> nor engraved image <S%H6459><s%>, neither rear you up <S%H6965><s%> a standing image <S%H4676><s%>, neither shall you set up <S%H5414><s%> any image <S%H4906><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> in your land <S%H776><s%>, to bow down <S%H7812><s%> unto it <S%H3068><s%>: for I am the Lord your God <S%H430><s%>.
You shall keep <S%H8104><s%> my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, and reverence <S%H3372><s%> my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>: I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
If you walk <S%H3212><s%> in my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments <S%H4687><s%>, and do them <S%H6213><s%>;

Then I will give <S%H5414><s%> you rain <S%H1653><s%> in due season <S%H6256><s%>, and the land <S%H776><s%> shall yield <S%H5414><s%> her increase <S%H2981><s%>, and the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall yield <S%H5414><s%> their fruit <S%H6529><s%>.

And your threshing <S%H1786><s%> shall reach <S%H5381><s%> unto the vintage <S%H1210><s%>, and the vintage <S%H1210><s%> shall reach <S%H5381><s%> unto the sowing time <S%H2233><s%>: and you shall eat <S%H398><s%> your bread <S%H3899><s%> to the full <S%H7648><s%>, and live <S%H3427><s%> in your land <S%H776><s%> safely <S%H983><s%>.

And I will give <S%H5414><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, and you shall lie down <S%H7901><s%>, and none shall make you afraid <S%H2729><s%>: and I will rid <S%H7673><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> animals <S%H2416><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%>, neither shall the sword <S%H2719><s%> go <S%H5674><s%> through your land <S%H776><s%>.
And you shall chase <S%H7291><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%>, and they shall fall <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you by the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

And five <S%H2568><s%> of you shall chase <S%H7291><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%>, and a hundred <S%H3967><s%> of you shall put ten thousand <S%H7233><s%> to flight <S%H7291><s%>: and your enemies <S%H341><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you by the sword <S%H2719><s%>.
For I will have respect <S%H6437><s%> unto you <S%H6509><s%>, and make you fruitful, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> you <S%H6965><s%>, and establish my covenant with you <S%H1285><s%>.
And you shall eat <S%H398><s%> old store <S%H3462><s%>, and bring forth <S%H3318><s%> the old <S%H3465><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the new <S%H2319><s%>.
And I will set <S%H5414><s%> my tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you <S%H5315><s%>: and my soul shall not abhor you <S%H1602><s%>.
And I will walk <S%H1980><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you <S%H1961><s%>, and will be your God <S%H430><s%>, and you shall be <S%H1961><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%>.

I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, which brought you forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, that you should not be their bondmen <S%H5650><s%>; and I have broken <S%H7665><s%> the bands <S%H4133><s%> of your yoke <S%H5923><s%>, and made you go <S%H3212><s%> upright <S%H6968><s%>.
But if you will not listen <S%H8085><s%> unto me <S%H6213><s%>, and will not do all these commandments <S%H4687><s%>;

And if you shall despise <S%H3988><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, or if your soul <S%H5315><s%> abhor <S%H1602><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%>, so that you will not do <S%H6213><s%> all my commandments <S%H4687><s%>, but that you break <S%H6565><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%>:

I also will do <S%H6213><s%> this unto you <S%H6485><s%>; I will even appoint over you terror <S%H928><s%>, consumption <S%H7829><s%>, and the burning fever <S%H6920><s%>, that shall consume <S%H3615><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and cause sorrow <S%H1727><s%> of heart <S%H5315><s%>: and you shall sow <S%H2232><s%> your seed <S%H2233><s%> in vain <S%H7385><s%>, for your enemies <S%H341><s%> shall eat it <S%H398><s%>.

And I will set <S%H5414><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against you <S%H5062><s%>, and you shall be slain before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%>: they that hate <S%H8130><s%> you shall reign <S%H7287><s%> over you <S%H5127><s%>; and you shall flee when none pursues you <S%H7291><s%>.
And if you will not yet <S%H5704><s%> for all this listen <S%H8085><s%> unto me <S%H3256><s%>, then I will punish you seven times <S%H7651><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> for your sins <S%H2403><s%>.

And I will break <S%H7665><s%> the pride <S%H1347><s%> of your power <S%H5797><s%>; and I will make <S%H5414><s%> your heaven <S%H8064><s%> as iron <S%H1270><s%>, and your earth <S%H776><s%> as brass <S%H5154><s%>:

And your strength <S%H3581><s%> shall be spent <S%H8552><s%> in vain <S%H7385><s%>: for your land <S%H776><s%> shall not yield <S%H5414><s%> her increase <S%H2981><s%>, neither shall the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> yield <S%H5414><s%> their fruits <S%H6529><s%>.

And if you walk <S%H3212><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> unto me <S%H14><s%>, and will not listen <S%H8085><s%> unto me <S%H3254><s%>; I will bring seven times <S%H7651><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> plagues <S%H4347><s%> upon you according to your sins <S%H2403><s%>.

I will also send <S%H7971><s%> wild <S%H7704><s%> animals <S%H2416><s%> among you <S%H7921><s%>, which shall rob you of your sons, and destroy <S%H3772><s%> your cattle <S%H929><s%>, and make you few in number <S%H4591><s%>; and your high ways <S%H1870><s%> shall be desolate <S%H8074><s%>.
And if you will not be reformed <S%H3256><s%> by me by these things <S%H1980><s%>, but will walk contrary unto me <S%H7147><s%>;
Then will I also walk <S%H1980><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> unto you <S%H5221><s%>, and will punish you yet <S%H1571><s%> seven times <S%H7651><s%> for your sins <S%H2403><s%>.

And I will bring <S%H935><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> upon you <S%H5358><s%>, that shall avenge the quarrel <S%H5359><s%> of my covenant <S%H1285><s%>: and when you are gathered together <S%H622><s%> inside <S%H413><s%> your cities <S%H5892><s%>, I will send <S%H7971><s%> the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you <S%H5414><s%>; and you shall be delivered into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the enemy <S%H341><s%>.

And when I have broken <S%H7665><s%> the staff <S%H4294><s%> of your bread <S%H3899><s%>, ten <S%H6235><s%> women <S%H802><s%> shall bake <S%H644><s%> your bread <S%H3899><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> oven <S%H8574><s%>, and they shall deliver <S%H7725><s%> you your bread <S%H3899><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> by weight <S%H4948><s%>: and you shall eat <S%H398><s%>, and not be satisfied <S%H7646><s%>.
And if you will not for all this <S%H2063><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> unto me <S%H1980><s%>, but walk contrary unto me <S%H7147><s%>;

Then I will walk <S%H1980><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> unto you also in fury <S%H2534><s%>; and I <S%H637><s%>, even I <S%H3256><s%>, will chastise you seven times <S%H7651><s%> for your sins <S%H2403><s%>.
And you shall eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of your sons <S%H1121><s%>, and the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of your daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall you eat <S%H398><s%>.

And I will destroy <S%H8045><s%> your high places <S%H1116><s%>, and cut down <S%H3772><s%> your images <S%H2553><s%>, and cast <S%H5414><s%> your carcasses <S%H6297><s%> upon the carcasses <S%H6297><s%> of your idols <S%H1544><s%>, and my soul <S%H5315><s%> shall abhor you <S%H1602><s%>.

And I will make <S%H5414><s%> your cities <S%H5892><s%> waste <S%H2723><s%>, and bring <S%H8074><s%> your sanctuaries <S%H4720><s%> unto desolation <S%H8074><s%>, and I will not smell <S%H7306><s%> the smell <S%H7381><s%> of your sweet odors <S%H5207><s%>.
And I will bring <S%H8074><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> into desolation <S%H8074><s%>: and your enemies <S%H341><s%> which live <S%H3427><s%> in it shall be astonished at it <S%H8074><s%>.

And I will scatter <S%H2219><s%> you among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and will draw out <S%H7324><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you <S%H776><s%>: and your land shall be desolate <S%H8077><s%>, and your cities <S%H5892><s%> waste <S%H2723><s%>.

Then shall the land <S%H776><s%> enjoy <S%H7521><s%> her sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, as long <S%H3117><s%> as it lies desolate <S%H8074><s%>, and you be in your enemies <S%H341><s%>' land <S%H776><s%>; even then shall the land <S%H776><s%> rest <S%H7673><s%>, and enjoy <S%H7521><s%> her sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>.
As long as <S%H3117><s%> it crouches desolate <S%H8074><s%> it shall rest <S%H7673><s%>; because it did not rest <S%H7673><s%> in your sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, when you lived upon it <S%H3427><s%>.

And upon them that are left <S%H7604><s%> alive of you I will send <S%H935><s%> a faintness <S%H4816><s%> into their hearts <S%H3824><s%> in the lands <S%H776><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%>; and the sound <S%H6963><s%> of a shaken <S%H5086><s%> leaf <S%H5929><s%> shall chase <S%H7291><s%> them <S%H5127><s%>; and they shall flee, as fleeing <S%H4499><s%> from a sword <S%H2719><s%>; and they shall fall <S%H5307><s%> when none pursues <S%H7291><s%>.

And they shall fall <S%H3782><s%> one <S%H376><s%> upon another <S%H251><s%>, as it were before <S%H6440><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%>, when none pursues <S%H7291><s%>: and you shall have no power to stand <S%H8617><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%>.
And you shall perish <S%H6><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and the land <S%H776><s%> of your enemies <S%H341><s%> shall eat you up <S%H398><s%>.

And they that are left <S%H7604><s%> of you shall pine away <S%H4743><s%> in their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> in your enemies <S%H341><s%>' lands <S%H776><s%>; and also in the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> shall they pine away with them <S%H4743><s%>.

If they shall confess <S%H3034><s%> their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, and the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, with their trespass <S%H4604><s%> which they trespassed <S%H4603><s%> against me <S%H1980><s%>, and that also they have walked contrary unto me <S%H7147><s%>;

And that I also have walked <S%H3212><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> unto them <S%H935><s%>, and have brought them into the land <S%H776><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%>; if then <S%H176><s%> their uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> hearts <S%H3824><s%> be humbled <S%H3665><s%>, and they then accept <S%H7521><s%> of the punishment of their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>:

Then will I remember <S%H2142><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, and also my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and also my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with Abraham <S%H85><s%> will I remember <S%H2142><s%>; and I will remember <S%H2142><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.

The land <S%H776><s%> also shall be left <S%H5800><s%> of them <S%H7521><s%>, and shall enjoy her sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, while she lies desolate <S%H8074><s%> outside them <S%H7521><s%>: and they shall accept of the punishment of their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>: because <S%H3282><s%>, even because <S%H3282><s%> they despised <S%H3988><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%>, and because their soul <S%H5315><s%> abhorred <S%H1602><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%>.

And yet <S%H637><s%> for all that <S%H2063><s%>, when they are <S%H1571><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%>, I will not cast them away <S%H3988><s%>, neither will I abhor <S%H1602><s%> them <S%H3615><s%>, to destroy them utterly, and to break <S%H6565><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them <S%H3068><s%>: for I am the Lord their God <S%H430><s%>.

But I will for their sakes remember <S%H2142><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of their ancestors <S%H7223><s%>, whom I brought forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, that I might be their God <S%H430><s%>: I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

These are the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments <S%H4941><s%> and laws <S%H8451><s%>, which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H5414><s%> between him and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in mountain <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
